title: Herstyler Classic Forever Ceramic Flat Iron
description: Solid ceramic plates guarantee smooth straightening motion without pulling or breakage of hair. Faster heat-up time than conventional coil straightening irons - It will rise to the desired temperature in less than 25 seconds from being turned on.

title: TRESemme Fresh Start Shampoo, Dry
description: TRESemmé® Freshstart Dry Shampoo Volumizing For Fine/Oily Hair.Used by professionals.Oil & odor remover with mineral clay & citrus.Professional quality.
